ingredients: 1  egg, 1 cup persimmon pulp,   +   1/2 cup canned sweetened condensed milk, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1 tablespoon melted butter, 1 cup white sugar, 1 cup all-purpose flour, 2 teaspoons baking soda,   +   1/2 teaspoon salt,   +   1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon
nutrition: Total Fat 8g 10%, Saturated Fat 4g 22%, Cholesterol 67mg 22%, Sodium 1008mg 44%, Total Carbohydrate 115g 42%, Dietary Fiber 2g 6%, Total Sugars 71g, Protein 8g, Vitamin C 40mg 199%, Calcium 139mg 11%, Iron 3mg 18%, Potassium 378mg 8%
